name: FPVSpottr
desc: Website for FPV pilots to share flying spots and organize flying groups.
features: Designed and implemented a PostgreSQL Schema and wrote RESTful API using SQLAlchemy, allowing users to create, read, update, and delete Spots and Groups
Integrated AWS cloud storage using Boto3 SDK, allowing users to upload images for their Spot, Groups, and Profiles
Designed a clean and functional Frontend using React, HTML and CSS, allowing users to easily navigate the website

name: SoundCloudClone
desc: A functional clone of SoundCloud, allowing users to upload and playback audio, create playlists.
features: Used React Context to create a persistent audio player, allowing users to play an audio file while navigating the website
Integrated AWS cloud storage using Boto3 SDK, allowing users to upload, update, and delete audio and image files
Improved Frontend design using React, HTML, and CSS, providing users a cohesive experience
